title: Art show at mall gallery
text:
Published: Sat, October 3, 2015 @ 12:05 a.m. 
Staff report 
NILES 
The Community Artworks Regional Annual Artists Exhibition will open Sunday at Art Outreach Gallery in Eastwood Mall. The juried exhibit showcases work by artists living within a 50-mile radius, and runs through Nov. 8. 
An opening reception will take place Sunday from 2 to 4 p.m. Admission is $5. Mary Ann Breisch, executive director at Valley Art Center in Chagrin Falls, juried the entries, awarding artists $675 in prize money. She chose the artwork and a tribute section, honoring artist Rochelle Ensor, who died last year. 
The gallery in the JCPenneyâ€™s concourse. Hours are 5 to 9 p.m. Friday, 1 to 9 p.m. Saturday, and 1 to 5 p.m. Sunday. Admission is free. Other stories of interest
